Surgeries &Procedures performed Independently:
 
1.
Nonoperative management of all types of fractures and cold cases(TB,CTEV etc)
 
2.
Debridement and lavage of wounds in open fractures
 
3.
Closed and open reduction of fractures and dislocations
 
4.
Skilled management of all types of trauma
 
 
5.
‘K’ wire fixation of distal radial and pediatric long bone fractures
 
6.
Plation/Nailing of forearm fractures
 
7.
ORIF/CRIF of phalangeal and metacarpal fractures using ‘K’ wires .
 
8.
Fixation/ Tension band wiring for Olecranon, Patella, medial and lateral Malleoli
 
9.
Foot fracture fixation including Lisfranc injuries
 
10.
Fasciotomy, Split Skin Grafting
 
 
11.
Amputations
